column1: 4.1.4.2.1.4	Summary of evidence and recommendations for anticholinergic drugs
Mirabegron and vibegron are better than placebo for improvement of OAB/UUI symptoms.
Adverse event rates with mirabegron and vibegron are similar to those of placebo.
Beta-3 agonists are as effective as antimuscarinics in the management of OAB but with lower dry   mouth rates.
Patients inadequately treated with solifenacin 5 mg may benefit more from the addition of mirabegron   rather than dose escalation of solifenacin.
